document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Callipia Guenée, 1858 (Lepidoptera, Geometridae), with the description of 15 new taxa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Callipia Guenée, 1858 (Lepidoptera, Geometridae), with the description of 15 new taxa

subSubSection.paragraph:
Closest relative of
C. wojtusiaki
sp. nov. and
C.wojtusiaki septentrionalis
subsp. nov . The geographical range overlaps with the latter. The male uncus is narrower than in
C. wojtusiaki
sp. nov. The wing patterns do not offer reliable diagnostic characters. COI-barcode: the minimum observed distance to
C.milleri
sp. nov. is 1.0%.
The species is named in honour of James S. Miller (AMNH), USA.
